snippet: President Obama is apparently planning to catch up on his TV watching on a weekend visit to Southern California.
abstract: Pres Obama plans on binge-watching HBO television series True Detective over the President’s Day weekend, which he will spend in Sunnylands, historic Annenberg estate in Rancho Mirage, Calif.
lead_paragraph: President Obama is apparently planning to catch up on his TV watching on a weekend visit to Southern California.

headline.main: Obama’s Weekend in Sunnylands, With Lots of TV
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Weekend in Sunnylands, With Lots of TV
